titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the right honourable the lord mayor, aldermen, and commons of the city of London, in common-council assembled on the thirteenth of January, 1680 to the King's most Excellent Majesty, for the sitting of this present Parliament prorogu'd to the twentieth instant : together with the resolutions, orders, and debates of the said court.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
